title: Stress and you: learning to cope (TEFC)
creator_credit: Herbert Long and Neil Mawby Productions
brief_description: Recognition of stress as a health problem stemming from emotional or environmental pressures. Suggests ways of dealing with stressful situations, including a stress-reducing daily routine designed to avoid potential stress situations.
